definition: A professional who creates and develops visual concepts, typically specializing in the aesthetic design of various products, objects, or visual media. This term is commonly used to refer to a female individual practicing in this field.

examples.german: Die Designerin entwarf ein neues Kleid.
examples.english: The designer created a new dress.

examples.german: Die Designerin arbeitet für ein renommiertes Modelabel.
examples.english: The designer works for a prestigious fashion label.

examples.german: Die junge Designerin gewann einen internationalen Designpreis.
examples.english: The young designer won an international design award.
The designer also designs jewelry pieces.

examples.german: Die Designerin hat eine eigene Modemarke gegründet.
examples.english: The designer has established her own fashion brand.
